bug.author: kurt-rhee
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
When attempting to run a streamlit app, the app crashes with the following error: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33131958/85424244-87d08680-b52c-11ea-8fc8-413bfd467558.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
' streamlit run App.py ' What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
streamlit run App.py
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Assuming there were no bugs a browser would open up with the app. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
The following error message <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33131958/85424349-aa629f80-b52c-11ea-8a7c-4d9ab0c69252.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
Yes this was working yesterday, I am not sure what happened today. <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.62 Python version: 3.7 Using Conda OS version: Windows 10 Browser version: Chrome

comments.comment: I think this one has to do with an anaconda environment created wtih conda install rasterio. The conda-forge rasterio seems to work fine.
